description:
Fall is right around the corner! We are looking for high energy professionals that are looking to further their fitness and sales career!

You MUST have:

Reliable transportation.

The ability to sell, problem solve, and use your passion for fitness to ensure our client understands the value of working with a professional coach.

Willingness to learn, be coached, and always have a laser beam focus towards getting better everyday.

Organization skills ; You will have the responsibility of keeping track of your clients and trainers.

Put members through exercises specific to their needs, conditions, and injury status.

Have the ability to make 60 - 80 real calls per day and keep your planner filled with member appointments which are booked from our own members of the club - NO NEED to out source, huge plus if you can.

Understand basic payment structure of our programs, and have the ability to take payment via cash, check, or credit/debit card.

Exercise Physiology degree or be Certified from NASM or ISSA. Bachelors in Science is recommended for this position.

If you fit these criteria, i highly recommend applying! Talk to you soon!

- Chris

Vice President : EsportA Fitness Buffalo

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $40,000.00 - $75,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• Vision insurance

Schedule:
• 8 hour shift
• Weekends as needed

Willingness to travel:
• 25% (Preferred)

Work Location: In person
